thread.title: Great hotel on the Upper East Side
thread.title_full: Great hotel on the Upper East Side - Review of The Surrey, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Susieno5
title: Great hotel on the Upper East Side
text: this was our second time staying at The Surrey and we enjoyed it as much this time as the first time. The room was very comfortable with a small sitting area. We were able to check in early which was extremely nice as my husband was not feeling well. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who wants understated elegance with exceptional service.
